data.message: Seriously I know I'm crazy - but I'm telling u - I'm a loyal muther fuckin friend and I'm telling u I am a good listener. I know you're an ass and u trust nobody. But I'm real man. I really believe we could help each other and our crazy ass racing minds. I know Proof left a gaping hole in your soul, but that don't mean b/c u are famous - u can never get close 2 someone again. Not everyone needs something from u Marshall. Anyway - you got 90M followers. I know my words mean nothing to u.
